Headline: #75 74th-75thTemporary Westbound Reroute near 75th/South Shore
ShortDescription: Westbound 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Stony Island, 76th, Greenwood and 75th: due to, street blockage near 75th/South Shore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Stony Island, 76th, Greenwood and 75th: due to, street blockage near 75th/South Shore.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #30 South Chicago Temporary Northbound Reroute near 75th/South Shore

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #96 Lunt Temporary Reroute at Lunt/Belt
ShortDescription: 96 Lunt buses are temporarily rerouted via Lunt, Ridge, Pratt, Western and Lunt: due to, street blockage near Lunt/Belt.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#96 Lunt buses are temporarily rerouted via Lunt, Ridge, Pratt, Western and Lunt: due to, street blockage near Lunt/Belt.

Headline: Green and Pink Line Service Experiencing Significant Delays Due to Raised Bridge
ShortDescription: Green and Pink Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green and Pink Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown.

Some trains may be either held or rerouted before reaching the bridge (in order to maintain service across the remainder of the route). Listen for announcements and check train destination signs when boarding.

We apologize for this temporary inconvenience and appreciate your patience while the Chicago Department of Transportation works to complete the bridge operation. Allow extra travel time.
